title: Nobel Peace Prize Awarded to Journalists Maria Ressa and Dmitry Muratov
sub_head: Journalists are honored for efforts to safeguard freedom of expression
body:
The Nobel Peace Prize was awarded to journalists Maria Ressa and Dmitry Muratov for their efforts to defend freedom of expression in the Philippines and Russia.
“Free, independent and fact-based journalism serves to protect against abuse of power, lies and war propaganda,” the Norwegian Nobel Committee said in its announcement Friday, adding that freedom of expression and information help to ensure an informed public.
